name: Gunslingers & Zombies
detailed_description: Fight the zombie apocalypse. Use anything you can get your hands on to survive in the Old West. Revolvers, rifles, knives, cannons and fists are your weapons.  Try your hand at turn-based combat. Use tactical skills to save a group of gunslingers from death. Search nearby buildings for weapons and medicines.
